source: Public newsletter – Blackmere Consulting & The Muse

level_1: This week’s newsletter explains the STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result.
It shows beginners how a clear structure helps give concise and complete answers.
level_2: For interviews, avoid rambling by practicing each STAR section separately.
Includes tips on how to craft a focused story by keeping each part one or two sentences.
level_3: Mid-level candidates learn to add metrics or measurable outcomes to the Result section.
Newsletter offers guidance on choosing varied situations to highlight different Soft skills.
level_4: Senior professionals are taught to tie STAR stories back to business or role-specific impact.
Advanced guidance includes using the ‘STAR++’ method: adding ‘Lessons Learned’ after Result.
